name: autohide the menu & sidebar [New York Post]
description: Hides the New York Post header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.) Also applies to Page Six, which is a clone of the New York Post.
additional_info:
No comments, no social, no ads, no syndication, or at least as little as possible.

Identical to style 94728; there's no reason to install both styles.
